services.title: Our Services
services.website: We create stylish, mobile-friendly websites tailored for individuals and businesses. Custom design options are available based on your needs.
services.events: We create special celebration websites for birthdays, weddings, and more—featuring photos and heartfelt messages to make memories last.
services.procurement: We assist you in selecting and purchasing the right PCs and IT devices. Perfect for beginners seeking reliable guidance.
services.osSupport: We provide reliable support for installing and updating Windows or other operating systems, including restoring older PCs.
services.deviceSelection: We help you choose and purchase IT devices like iPhones and Androids, offering clear guidance even for beginners.
services.consulting: We offer IT consulting tailored to your needs—helping individuals and businesses optimize their digital environments.

ceoMessage.title: CEO Message
ceoMessage.message1: We provide optimal IT solutions tailored to each customer's individual needs.
ceoMessage.message2: If you are interested in high-quality, low-cost systems provided by an elementary school student CEO, please feel free to contact us.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.note: Prices are flexible and negotiable with customers (discounts possible, may also increase depending on requirements)

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.method: Work requests and inquiries are accepted via email

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.content: As this is operated by an elementary school student CEO, responses may be delayed on weekdays due to school commitments.
